HLlpvtP_5CQ#17#PL_oohi_O51Z_lORk8SCG_4x1: in the face of sharp downturns or stress events it provides households and businesses with the financing they need to participate in and thrive in a well-functioning economy is it difficult to anticipate or prevent sharks but sound policy can mitigate their impact

at the Federal Reserve we work hard to make sure that an initial shock in one area of the financial system does not spill over to other markets or institutions and cause severe or widespread streams of credit and caused outside declines in employment and economic activity
it is not our role nor should it be our objective to influence the allocation of credit within or across
